RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Digestion strength
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how powerful a pawn's various organs are for all forms of chemical digestion: true nourishing digestion, conversion into another material, assimilation, and any others.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Godlike Digestion
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: Whether due to magic or a technology that's not yet understood, [PAWN_label]'s digestive abilities are in a class of their own, capable of liquifying an entire Thrumbo in minutes.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Scouring acid
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] can turn prey into nutrient soup in the blink of an eye--or, at least, four times as fast as most predators.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Potent acid
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] can digest prey about twice as fast as most predators.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Normal acid strength
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] digests prey at a normal speed.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Weak acid
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] takes about twice as long to digest live meals as most predators.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Watery acid
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] takes about four times as long to digest prey as most predators. [PAWN_possessive] food is liable to die of boredom before dying of melting.
